verses.verse: Now in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> might be <S%H3615>accomplished,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> so that he made a <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> throughout all his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and put it also in <S%H4385>writing,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and he has <S%H6485>commanded<s%> me to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which is in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Whoever there is among you of all his <S%H5971>people,<s%> may his <S%H430>God<s%> be with <S%H5927>him,<s%> and let him go up to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which is in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> (he is <S%H430>God<s%>), which is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Whoever is <S%H7604>left,<s%> in any <S%H4725>place<s%> where he <S%H1481>lives,<s%> let the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5375>help<s%> him with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and with <S%H929>animals,<s%> besides the freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> which is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>'"

Then the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> even all whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5782>stirred<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> rose <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

All those who were <S%H5439>around<s%> them <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> with <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and with <S%H929>animals,<s%> and with precious <S%H4030>things,<s%> besides all that was willingly <S%H5068>offered.<s%>

Also <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and had <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>gods;<s%>

even <S%H3566>those,<s%> Cyrus <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4990>Mithredath<s%> the <S%H1489>treasurer,<s%> and <S%H5608>numbered<s%> them to <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

This is the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7970>them:<s%> thirty <S%H105>platters<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H105>platters<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4252>knives,<s%>

<S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3713>bowls<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H3713>bowls<s%> of a <S%H4932>second<s%> sort <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten,<s%> and <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> one <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

All the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%> <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar<s%> brought all these <S%H5927>up,<s%> when the <S%H1473>captives<s%> were brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
